trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Iepenje de Mozilla VPN-app op jo foarkarsapparaat
trans-unit.source: Open the Mozilla VPN app on your preferred device

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Meld jo oan by jo account

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Voila! Jo apparaat is automatysk tafoege oan jo VPN-list mei ferbûne apparaten
trans-unit.source: Voila! Your device has been automatically added to your VPN list of connected devices

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Iepenje Mozilla VPN op jo keazen desktop- of mobile apparaat
trans-unit.source: Open Mozilla VPN in your chosen desktop or mobile device

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Gean nei Ynstellingen en selektearje ‘Myn apparaten’
trans-unit.source: Go to Settings and select “My devices”

trans-unit.note: Bullet ordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Selektearje it ‘Jiskefet’piktogram njonken it apparaat dat jo fuortsmite wolle út jo list mei ferbûne apparaten
trans-unit.source: Select the “Trash” icon next to the device you want to remove from your list of connected devices

trans-unit.target: Folgje dizze flugge en ienfâldige 3-stappegids om al jo apparaten ienfâldich ta te foegjen en fuort te smiten.
trans-unit.source: Follow this quick and simple 3 step guide to add and remove all of your devices easily.

trans-unit.target: Hoe kin ik apparaten tafoegje en fuortsmite?
trans-unit.source: How do I add and remove devices?
